original:
In an effort to create indicators that measure gender equality, the United Nations developed two key measures: the Gender-Related Development Index (GDI) and the Gender Empowerment Measure (GEM). These indicators were first introduced in the 1995 United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) Human Development Report.


Several additional factors influence the assessment of gender equality and overall development. These include the inflati
